00049 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 // MSMeanData_HBEFA::MSLaneMeanDataValues - methods
00051 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 MSMeanData_HBEFA::MSLaneMeanDataValues::MSLaneMeanDataValues(MSLane* const lane, const SUMOReal length, const bool doAdd,
00053         const std::set<std::string>* const vTypes,
00054         const MSMeanData_HBEFA* parent)
00055     : MSMeanData::MeanDataValues(lane, length, doAdd, vTypes), myParent(parent), CO2(0), CO(0), HC(0), NOx(0), PMx(0), fuel(0) {}

00057 
00058 MSMeanData_HBEFA::MSLaneMeanDataValues::~MSLaneMeanDataValues() {
00059 }

00061 
00062 void
00063 MSMeanData_HBEFA::MSLaneMeanDataValues::reset(bool) {
00064     sampleSeconds = 0.;
00065     travelledDistance = 0.;
00066     CO2 = 0;
00067     CO = 0;
00068     HC = 0;
00069     NOx = 0;
00070     PMx = 0;
00071     fuel = 0;
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 void
00076 MSMeanData_HBEFA::MSLaneMeanDataValues::addTo(MSMeanData::MeanDataValues& val) const {
00077     MSLaneMeanDataValues& v = (MSLaneMeanDataValues&) val;
00078     v.sampleSeconds += sampleSeconds;
00079     v.travelledDistance += travelledDistance;
00080     v.CO2 += CO2;
00081     v.CO += CO;
00082     v.HC += HC;
00083     v.NOx += NOx;
00084     v.PMx += PMx;
00085     v.fuel += fuel;
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 void
00090 MSMeanData_HBEFA::MSLaneMeanDataValues::notifyMoveInternal(SUMOVehicle& veh, SUMOReal timeOnLane, SUMOReal speed) {
00091     sampleSeconds += timeOnLane;
00092     travelledDistance += speed * timeOnLane;
00093     const double a = veh.getPreDawdleAcceleration();
00094     CO += (timeOnLane * HelpersHBEFA::computeCO(veh.getVehicleType().getEmissionClass(), (double) speed, a));
00095     CO2 += (timeOnLane * HelpersHBEFA::computeCO2(veh.getVehicleType().getEmissionClass(), (double) speed, a));
00096     HC += (timeOnLane * HelpersHBEFA::computeHC(veh.getVehicleType().getEmissionClass(), (double) speed, a));
00097     NOx += (timeOnLane * HelpersHBEFA::computeNOx(veh.getVehicleType().getEmissionClass(), (double) speed, a));
00098     PMx += (timeOnLane * HelpersHBEFA::computePMx(veh.getVehicleType().getEmissionClass(), (double) speed, a));
00099     fuel += (timeOnLane * HelpersHBEFA::computeFuel(veh.getVehicleType().getEmissionClass(), (double) speed, a));
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 void
00104 MSMeanData_HBEFA::MSLaneMeanDataValues::write(OutputDevice& dev, const SUMOTime period,
00105         const SUMOReal /*numLanes*/, const int /*numVehicles*/) const {
00106     const SUMOReal normFactor = SUMOReal(3600. / STEPS2TIME(period) / myLaneLength);
00107     dev << "\" CO_abs=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(CO, 6) <<
00108         "\" CO2_abs=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(CO2, 6) <<
00109         "\" HC_abs=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(HC, 6) <<
00110         "\" PMx_abs=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(PMx, 6) <<
00111         "\" NOx_abs=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(NOx, 6) <<
00112         "\" fuel_abs=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(fuel, 6) <<
00113         "\"\n            CO_normed=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(normFactor * CO, 6) <<
00114         "\" CO2_normed=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(normFactor * CO2, 6) <<
00115         "\" HC_normed=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(normFactor * HC, 6) <<
00116         "\" PMx_normed=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(normFactor * PMx, 6) <<
00117         "\" NOx_normed=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(normFactor * NOx, 6) <<
00118         "\" fuel_normed=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(normFactor * fuel, 6);
00119     if (sampleSeconds > myParent->myMinSamples) {
00120         SUMOReal vehFactor = myParent->myMaxTravelTime / sampleSeconds;
00121         SUMOReal traveltime = myParent->myMaxTravelTime;
00122         if (travelledDistance > 0.f) {
00123             vehFactor = MIN2(vehFactor, myLaneLength / travelledDistance);
00124             traveltime = MIN2(traveltime, myLaneLength * sampleSeconds / travelledDistance);
00125         }
00126         dev << "\"\n            traveltime=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(traveltime) <<
00127             "\" CO_perVeh=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(CO * vehFactor, 6) <<
00128             "\" CO2_perVeh=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(CO2 * vehFactor, 6) <<
00129             "\" HC_perVeh=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(HC * vehFactor, 6) <<
00130             "\" PMx_perVeh=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(PMx * vehFactor, 6) <<
00131             "\" NOx_perVeh=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(NOx * vehFactor, 6) <<
00132             "\" fuel_perVeh=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(fuel * vehFactor, 6);
00133     }
00134     dev << "\"/>\n";
00135 }

00155 MSMeanData::MeanDataValues*
00156 MSMeanData_HBEFA::createValues(MSLane* const lane, const SUMOReal length, const bool doAdd) const {
00157     return new MSLaneMeanDataValues(lane, length, doAdd, &myVehicleTypes, this);
00158 }
